title: Application of Signature Pedagogy in Arts Education for Online Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Education Foundations and General Understanding of the Arts
context.additional_context: Process applying signature pedagogy to implement practical art learning experiences online, supporting learner growth through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructional designs utilizing the signature pedagogy of art creation, appreciation, and critique in online environments
Learners can perform two or more digital art activities (e.g., drawing, music production) using digital tools and share the outcomes
Learners can produce one type of art education instructional material (e.g., activity sheets, videos) incorporating peer feedback

resources: Open Educational Resources for Art Education (Free Image/Audio Sites)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
